original_text: And as they went to tell his disciples, behold, Jesus met them, saying, All hail. And they came and held him by the feet, and worshipped him.
korean_text: 예수께서 그들을 만나 이르시되 평안하냐 하시거늘 여자들이 나아가 그 발을 붙잡고 경배하니

sentences.original_text: And as they went to tell his disciples,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그의 제자들에게 알리러 갈 때,

sentences.original_text: And they came and held him by the feet,
